description: What is so dangerous about the song, "Glory to Hong Kong"? NPR's Scott Simon explains that the Chinese government is cracking down on any singing, quoting, or use of the song.
title: Opinion: 'Glory be to thee, Hong Kong!'

description: NPR correspondent Brian Mann went trekking on Sao Miguel, one of the most remote islands in the North Atlantic.  He found volcanic mountains, birdsong, solitude and lots of rain.
title: Hiking the Azores into lush mountains and stormy North Atlantic weather

description: A powerful solar storm struck Earth, triggering spectacular celestial light shows in skies around the world — and threatening possible disruptions to satellites and power grids.
title: Photos: See the Northern lights from rare, solar storm
